Name: YAIBA: NINJA GAIDEN Z
About the game: Step into a living comic book in this new take on the Ninja Gaiden series. Brandishing his ninja sword and the mecha weapons in his cyber arm, Yaiba slaughters zombies with brutal, over-the-top abandon. Will you slice enemies to pieces, crush them with Yaiba's cyborg arm or just rip off a zombieâ€™s arms to use as nunchucks? * The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.
